name: mongo-auth-next
description: This is a sample project that uses Mongoose and MongoDB to create users. This project illustrates how to use JWT's to authorize user access to protected routes.

scripts.pretty: npx concurrently "cd mongo-auth-jwt && npm run pretty" "cd frontend && npm run pretty"
scripts.setup: npx concurrently "cd mongo-auth-jwt && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install"
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
